name: VENI VIDI VICI
description:
VENI VIDI VICI is a text based game made for MS-DOS and DOSBox. You are a slave in the ancient Tirian Empire whose attempt to assassinate the tyrannical emperor has sent to to the Gladiator Arena as punishment. Most slaves in the arena do not live to get their first win most of the time. Your objective is to win gladiator battles to the point where you have the chance to fight the Emperor himself.

GAME FEATURES

  • Gladiators you can play whose ability scores are randomly determined.
  • Fair and balanced gameplay where the player and the opponent are on equal terms of health.
  • Nine stages of play that tells the story of your upbringing as a slave and your quest to assassinate the emperor,

The download of VENI VIDI VICI comes with the following:

  1. Game executable that can be run on DOSBox or a real DOS computer
  2. Instructions that teach you how to set up the game and play it.

VENI VIDI VICI is expected to be release on November 4th 2022, or XI-IV-MMXXII for those fluent in Roman Numerals.
